# isStandalone

**Instance Property**

Sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the receiver represents a standalone XML document.

## Declaration

```swift
var isStandalone: Bool { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **standalone**: [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver represents a standalone XML document, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Discussion

A standalone document does not have an external DTD associated with it.

## Managing Document Attributes

- **characterEncoding**: Sets the character encoding of the receiver to `encoding`,
- **documentContentKind**: Sets the kind of output content for the receiver.
- **dtd**: Returns an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTD] object representing the internal DTD associated with the receiver.
- **mimeType**: Returns the MIME type for the receiver.
- **version**: Sets the version of the receiver’s XML.
